outputs.output_descr: Development of the system of additional MDG-related targets and indicators and methodology of their monitoring; development of the organizational and technological schemes of collection and processing MDG-related monitoring data; preparation of annual and five-year MDG progress reports, carrying out broad public discussions about their findings, submission of these reports to the UN on behalf of the Government of Belarus; submission of proposals related to policy adjustments necessary to attain MDGs to the Government of Belarus.

project_descr: DEVELOPMENT OF THE SYSTEM TO MONITOR ACHIEVEMENT OF THE MILLENNIUM DEVELOPMENT GOALS
